title: Senior Mobile Engineer
full_description: Senior Mobile Engineer If you are a Senior Mobile Engineer with experience, please read on!Top Reasons to Work with UsWe are a software consulting firm in the Bay area, specializing in mobile app creation for iOT. We are growing rapidly and looking to add an impressive Android Engineer to our team!What You Will Be Doing- You will have the opportunity to tackle various coding obstacles and make smart decisions- Build impressive product features- Provide technical expertise to leadership and other teamsWhat You Need for this Position- Android- Kotlin- UI Design- You will need the ability to conceptualize, design and build product featuresWhat's In It for You- Vacation/PTO- Medical- Dental- Vision- Bonus- 401kSo, if you are a Senior Mobile Engineer with experience, please apply today! - Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Your Right to Work â€“ In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
